job.title: Sr.Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: 1)*Job Title : Sr.Site Reliability Engineer<br>*Total relevant experience : 7 + years<br>*Job Location : Remote<br>**Please NOTE: We have positions open in CANADA and US both **<br>Job description:<br><br>- 7-9 yrs Total IT experience.<br>- Experience of at least 4-5 years within an Enterprise SRE configuration.(Mandatory)<br>AWS: 4 years (Mandatory)- AWS Cost Optimization, Developing applications in an AWS environment & Terraform.<br>- Debugging production issues: 4+ years (Mandatory).<br>- Python: 2-3 years (Mandatory)-DJango, Celery.<br>-Good to have: AWS Certified. <br>- Experience in with development technology stack-Docker, Python, Django, Celery, Postgres. AWS serverless technologies(Lambda, Cognito, API Gateway, Step Functions, AppSync), - -Experience in operational technology stack(Uwsgi, Nginx, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch, Redis). Experience with automation tools- Salt, Vagrant, Packer. Experience with metrics and orchestration tools-Jenkins, NewRelic, Datadog, Loggly.<br><br>-He/ She needs to be the best buddy of Key IT Stakeholders and sponsors.<br>-Healthcare Industry exposure is a plus.
